item.title: Knolling
item.description: Knolling is the practice of organizing things neatly, especially to arrange things in parallel lines or at right angles. Thanks to Jason Kottke for the always be knolling idea and background info, which he attributes to Andrew Kromelow. For some inspriation see Things Organized Neatly, a Tumblr from Austin Radcliffe. More: Hannah Sitzer, Always Be “Knolling”â€”My New Favorite Word, Inspired by Tom Sachs, 2011. A Tom Sachs movie, “Always be knolling”, from Ten Bullets
